articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Lao Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, November 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with a delegation of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association led by Tong Yeu Tho, member of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, standing vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the National Construction Front of Laos and chairman of the association, which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday. 
					 The head of the delegation said he was deeply moved to witness the Korean people dynamically advancing socialist construction under the banner of the Juche idea created by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people will achieve national reunification as early as possible true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 He expressed the belief that the Korean people will win the final victory under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
